articles.author: Anthony Ha
articles.title: Itch.io is the latest marketplace to crack down on adult games - TechCrunch
articles.description: Indie video game marketplace Itch.io announced this week that it has "deindexed" adult and not-safe-for-work games, removing them from its browse and search pages.
articles.content:
Indie video game marketplace Itch.io announced this week that it has “deindexed” adult and not-safe-for-work games, removing them from its browse and search pages.
The move, the company said, was in… [+3054 chars]
